official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the Department of Energy for the Clinch River Breeder Reactor Research and Development Project for Fiscal Years 1984 through 1990.
short_title: Clinch River Breeder Reactor Research and Development Project Authorization for Fiscal Years 1984 through 1990

summary.text: Clinch River Breeder Reactor Research and Development Project Authorization for Fiscal Years 1984 through 1990 - Authorizes appropriations to the Department of Energy for the Clinch River Breeder Reactor Research and Development Project for FY 1984 through 1990. Provides that the total amount of funding for such project shall not exceed $1,500,000,000.

titles.title: Clinch River Breeder Reactor Research and Development Project Authorization for Fiscal Years 1984 through 1990
A bill to authorize appropriations to the Department of Energy for the Clinch River Breeder Reactor Research and Development Project for Fiscal Years 1984 through 1990.
